opening_theme: "KI-ZU-NA ~Haruka Naru Mono e (KI-ZU-NA 〜遥かなる者へ)" by Hitomisora (Hitomi Yoshida & Sora Izumikawa)
ending_theme: #1: "Kaze ga Nanika wo Iou to Shiteiru (風がなにかを言おうとしている)" by Kou (Saori Hayami) (eps 1-18)
#2: "Shiawase no Kotodama (シアワセの言霊)" by Kuu (Yukana), Kou (Saori Hayami), Tama (Mikako Takahashi) (eps 19-24)
